title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Unable to open a file in multiple editors simultaneously
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If a file is already opened in one editor, attempting to open it in another editor does not display a warning or error message.
OB: When attempting to open a file that is already open in another editor, the system allows the operation without providing any notification or warning.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed, informing the user that the file is already open in another editor and cannot be opened simultaneously in multiple editors.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor.
3. Observe the absence of a warning or error message.
